thread.title: T Smith
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by T Smith

author: T Smith
title: T Smith
text: We recently purchased a leather couch and love seat from Grand's. It was a pleasure shopping the show room. The employees were very helpful and not pushy at all. We were greeted with a cold glass bottle coke and helped locate what we were in search of. The whole process was quick and easy. We had the furniture delivered the next day. The delivery men were very nice and very respectful of our home. They carefully brought in the furniture and even put felt pads on the bottom of the legs to protect our hardwood floors. I would recommend Grand Home Furnishing to anyone.
